title: US Macroeconomic Data (1959–1995, Baltagi)
description:
Description
Time series data on 3 US macroeconomic variables for 1959–1995,
extracted from the Citibank data base.

parameters.tbill: Average of 3 month treasury-bill rate (per annum).
parameters.mbase: Average of the seasonally adjusted monetary base.

format: A quarterly multiple time series from 1959(1) to 1995(2) with 3 variables.
